Adventure Guild Member: Talk to the Manager of the Adventure Guild if you want to create a higher-quality item. He only comes to the town" when the Lord or Clan of the castle destroys a certain type of monster" to celebrate the occasion. He's most interested in: "Master Anays" "High Priestess van Halter" "Varka's Chief Horus" "Ketra's Brakki" "Cherub Galaxia" "Ocean Flame Ashakiel" "Storm Winged Naga" "Doom Blade Tanatos" "Anakim's Nemesis Zakaron"
